name: mightiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very large, powerful, or important: The mightiness of the mind has virtually no limits. Mightiness is not something that the band are really interested in.
More examplesFewer examplesHe surveyed the mightiness of God's creation spread out before him.This beautiful picture gives an idea of the mightiness of the car.What is largely missing from this performance is the mightiness of King Lear's rage and his terrible fear of madness.
